about_the_game:
Catalog 2 gift: Set of item for adventurer containing the following enhancement goods:
- Denore Bottle ×５
- Inoph Bottle ×５
- Fluorite Fragment ×１０
- Amphibole Fragment ×１０
- Silver Scrap ×１０
- Balmy Fluid ×１０
- Coarse Tempering Powder ×１０

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz or AMD Phenom II X2 550, 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GTX or AMD Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible

esrb.descriptors: Violence, Blood, Mild Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Partial Nudity, Use of Alcohol

*languages with full audio support
